title: The Truth About America’s ‘Crime Wave’ Panic 2.16.22
itunes:title: The Truth About America’s ‘Crime Wave’ Panic 2.16.22
description:
In episode 1086, Jack and Miles are joined by civil rights lawyer and social justice advocate Alec Karakatsanis to discuss California Crime Is Out Of Control Narrative Winning, Shoplifting And Train Theft “Crises”: Where Do These Stories Come From?, Focusing On Structural Inequality Is Considered Not Serious, But Banning Rap Music Is Serious?, Trudeau Invoking the “Emergencies Act” To Stop The Convoy Is Politically Loaded and more!

  1. California Crime Is Out Of Control Narrative Winning
  2. Shoplifting And Train Theft “Crises”: Where Do These Stories Come From?
  3. Focusing On Structural Inequality Is Considered Not Serious, But Banning Rap Music Is Serious?
  4. Trudeau Invoking the “Emergencies Act” To Stop The Convoy Is Politically Loaded
  5. Canada News: Canada Initiates Emergency Act, Expanding Measures to End Protests
  6. War Measures Act


Follow: @CivRightsCorps

Watch: Muhammad Ali Recites His Poem About the Attica Prison Riot

LISTEN: Dance To The Music by Sly & The Family Stone Live Woodstock

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
